I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night,'' Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office.

In an otherwise charming feature story posted on MLB.com about the charity work that he and his wife do for stray dogs, Mark Buehrle 's comments noticeably changed in tone when Michael Vick 's name came up. Even if you are not a dog lover, how can you sit there and make two dogs fight and one is going to die? said( Mark Buehrle ).`` How could you do that if you are somewhat sane? Human Rights Watch head Kenneth Roth said that Obama had clearly sided with democracy but that it was not until Zine El Abidine Ben Ali `` was basically out the door'' that France took sides. The EU, the US and others learned a lesson, he added. Western nations had long supported the Tunisian leader, seeing him as a bulwark against Islamic militants in the region. I didn't want to be overaggressive. I just wanted to let my teammates do what they had to do early in the game because they( Grizzlies) were taking away some of the shots I wanted by zoning up. My teammates held the fort, and then when I got an opportunity, I just tried to make the best of it. Allen Iverson made 10-of-24 shots, including 4-of-7 3-pointers.
